languages.text: "Он самый. Ублюдок жирный". {n}Октавиана отвечает вам с самой дружелюбной и милой из возможных улыбок.{/n} "А звезды системы Гремнар потухли уже тысяч сто лет назад, и системы вокруг них являются настоящим рассадником смерти".

"The very same. The greasy piece of grox shit," {n}Octaviana says, wearing the sweetest, most amiable smile one could imagine.{/n} "But the stars of the Gremnor System all died around a hundred thousand years ago, and the systems around them are a true breeding ground of death."
languages.original_text: "Он самый. Ублюдок жирный". {n}Октавиана отвечает вам с самой дружелюбной и милой из возможных улыбок.{/n} "А звезды системы Гремнар потухли уже тысяч сто лет назад, и системы вокруг них являются настоящим рассадником смерти".

traits.locale_text: "The very same. The greasy piece of grox shit," {n}Octaviana says, wearing the sweetest, most amiable smile one could imagine.{/n} "But the stars of the Gremnor System all died around a hundred thousand years ago, and the systems around them are a true breeding ground of death."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

traits.locale_text: "The very same. The greasy piece of grox shit," {n}Octaviana says, wearing the sweetest, most amiable smile one could imagine.{/n} "But the stars of the Gremnor System all died around a hundred thousand years ago, and the systems around them are a true breeding ground of death."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: “就是他，格洛克斯兽拉出来的臭屎。”{n}奥克塔维娜说这句话的时候，脸上挂着无比甜蜜、无比和蔼的笑容。{/n}“不过别误会了她的意思，格雷姆诺星系的群星早在几十万年前就熄灭了，如今它周围所有的星系都是死亡的温床。”
languages.original_text: "The very same. The greasy piece of grox shit," {n}Octaviana says, wearing the sweetest, most amiable smile one could imagine.{/n} "But the stars of the Gremnor System all died around a hundred thousand years ago, and the systems around them are a true breeding ground of death."

traits.locale_text: “就是他，格洛克斯兽拉出来的臭屎。”{n}奥克塔维娜说这句话的时候，脸上挂着无比甜蜜、无比和蔼的笑容。{/n}“不过别误会了她的意思，格雷姆诺星系的群星早在几十万年前就熄灭了，如今它周围所有的星系都是死亡的温床。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: 「まったく同じよ。脂ぎった蜥蜴牛のクソの塊です」{n}オクタヴィアナは、想像できる限り甘く、愛想のいい笑顔を浮かべて言う。{/n}「グレムナール星系の星々は10万年前にすべて滅び、その周辺の星系はまさに死の温床となっているのです」
languages.original_text: "The very same. The greasy piece of grox shit," {n}Octaviana says, wearing the sweetest, most amiable smile one could imagine.{/n} "But the stars of the Gremnor System all died around a hundred thousand years ago, and the systems around them are a true breeding ground of death."

traits.locale_text: 「まったく同じよ。脂ぎった蜥蜴牛のクソの塊です」{n}オクタヴィアナは、想像できる限り甘く、愛想のいい笑顔を浮かべて言う。{/n}「グレムナール星系の星々は10万年前にすべて滅び、その周辺の星系はまさに死の温床となっているのです」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: «El mismo. Estiércol grasiento de grox». {n}Octaviana habla con la sonrisa más dulce y amistosa que podrías imaginar.{/n} «Pero las estrellas del sistema Gremnor se extinguieron hace cien milenios y en los sistemas que las rodean solo hay muerte».
languages.original_text: "The very same. The greasy piece of grox shit," {n}Octaviana says, wearing the sweetest, most amiable smile one could imagine.{/n} "But the stars of the Gremnor System all died around a hundred thousand years ago, and the systems around them are a true breeding ground of death."

traits.locale_text: «El mismo. Estiércol grasiento de grox». {n}Octaviana habla con la sonrisa más dulce y amistosa que podrías imaginar.{/n} «Pero las estrellas del sistema Gremnor se extinguieron hace cien milenios y en los sistemas que las rodean solo hay muerte».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: « Oui, c'est bien ce gros sac à merde de grox, » {n}répond Octaviana avec le sourire le plus doux et le plus charmant au monde.{/n} « Mais les étoiles de Gremnor sont éteintes depuis cent mille ans et les systèmes qui les entourent ne sont rien d'autre que des territoires où règne la mort. »
languages.original_text: "The very same. The greasy piece of grox shit," {n}Octaviana says, wearing the sweetest, most amiable smile one could imagine.{/n} "But the stars of the Gremnor System all died around a hundred thousand years ago, and the systems around them are a true breeding ground of death."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, c'est bien ce gros sac à merde de grox, » {n}répond Octaviana avec le sourire le plus doux et le plus charmant au monde.{/n} « Mais les étoiles de Gremnor sont éteintes depuis cent mille ans et les systèmes qui les entourent ne sont rien d'autre que des territoires où règne la mort. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: "Genau der. Das schmierige Stück Grox-Scheiße", {n}sagt Octaviana mit dem süßesten und freundlichsten Lächeln, das man sich vorstellen kann.{/n} "Aber die Sterne des Gremnor-Systems sind vor etwa hunderttausend Jahren gestorben und die Systeme, die dort noch existieren, sind alle zu wahrhaftigen Brutstätten des Todes verkommen."
languages.original_text: "The very same. The greasy piece of grox shit," {n}Octaviana says, wearing the sweetest, most amiable smile one could imagine.{/n} "But the stars of the Gremnor System all died around a hundred thousand years ago, and the systems around them are a true breeding ground of death."

traits.locale_text: "Genau der. Das schmierige Stück Grox-Scheiße", {n}sagt Octaviana mit dem süßesten und freundlichsten Lächeln, das man sich vorstellen kann.{/n} "Aber die Sterne des Gremnor-Systems sind vor etwa hunderttausend Jahren gestorben und die Systeme, die dort noch existieren, sind alle zu wahrhaftigen Brutstätten des Todes verkommen."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: "Bizzat kendisi. Yağlı groks boku..." {n}Octaviana bunları, hayal edilebilecek en tatlı, en sevimli gülümsemesini takınarak söylüyor.{/n} "Gremnor Sistemi'nin yıldızları, yüz bin yıl önce tamamen yok olmuştur; çevrelerindeki sistemler ise tam bir ölüm yuvasına dönüşmüştür."
languages.original_text: "The very same. The greasy piece of grox shit," {n}Octaviana says, wearing the sweetest, most amiable smile one could imagine.{/n} "But the stars of the Gremnor System all died around a hundred thousand years ago, and the systems around them are a true breeding ground of death."

traits.locale_text: "Bizzat kendisi. Yağlı groks boku..." {n}Octaviana bunları, hayal edilebilecek en tatlı, en sevimli gülümsemesini takınarak söylüyor.{/n} "Ama Gremnor Sistemi'nin yıldızları yüz bin yıl önce tamamen yok olmuştur ve çevrelerindeki sistemler tam bir ölüm yuvasına dönüşmüştür."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana
